------=_NextPart_000_000B_01C06E0E.3CCC66C0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Razor Claw raised to his feat to stubborn to know when to quit. he stepped =
forward, ready for anything the larger bot had to offer. "You ready to surr=
ender yet?" He asked sarcastically even though he already knew the answer.
=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 9:34 PM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice
=


  Mobster watched, wondering how Razorclaw felt...and enjoying the though=
t. Mobster, as cruel as the Mini-Mafia could be, waited for Razorclaw to re=
gain his strength and composure, he wanted to knock it out of Razorclaw aga=
in...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 3:16 AM
    Subject: Re:=
 Sorry soulstice


    Razor Claw bounced off Mobster, the impact made his =
head spin. The mighty raptor heard Mobster have some smart ass comment towa=
rd him. He looked up in time to see Mobster raise his weapon again. Razor C=
law turned and tried to run and got just far enough to avoid being hit dire=
ctly by the beam. The weapon still had a devastating effect on him though a=
s the shrapnel of dirt and pebbles shred at his skin. The blast shot him ab=
out sixty yards from where he'd started. He landed with an ooof as his body=
 skipped multiple times across the hard African ground. There he lay in pai=
n, trying to regain his strength and composure.
      ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
      From: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: S=
unday, December 24, 2000 1:53 PM
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


     =
 Mobster wobbled some, but that was the extent of it. He turned around.

  =
    Mobster (Grenade voice): Are you trying to knock me over, little man?

=
      Mobster fires at Razorclaw once...
        ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent:=
 Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


 =
       A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw as Mobsters foot raised above him=
. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. His energy was low so he didn't w=
ant to risk his shield not holding. He ran toward Mobster. Mobsters foot st=
ruck the ground behind Razor Claw, the impact shook the ground sending Razo=
r claw rolling past the giant gestalt. He rolled to his feat and turned aga=
in ready for battle. He dove forward at Mobsters rear end hoping the giant =
would still be off balance enough to knock over.
          ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
          From: SOULSTICE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
          Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 10:46 AM
          Subject: Re: S=
orry soulstice


          (I normally am against stomping, but...)
       =
    
          Mobster raised his foot.

          Mobster (Kracken voice):=
 Over!

          Mobster brung his foot down towards Razorclaw...
        =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
           =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:11 =
PM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


            Razor Claw remain=
ed still as a statue, watching the battle rage around him. He opened a comm=
 to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available maximal, I'm pinned down=
 and need some coverfire."
              ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
          From: SOULSTICE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          =
    Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
              Subject: Re: So=
rry soulstice


              Mobster stood still. The raptor would have to=
 move sometime.

              Mobster (Horn Drill voice): He'll have to mo=
ve sometime. Who helped to build this house?

              Mobster kept hi=
s cannon aimed at Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
                ----- =
Original Message ----- 
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12=
:48 PM
                Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                Razor=
 Claw knew that there was only one way to survive a blast from a weapon of =
that size. he transformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on his shie=
ld. The ground around him incinerated on contact. He survived but it was sa=
pping to much of his strength. The raptor couldn't move without deactivatin=
g his shield.
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
             =
     From: SOULSTICE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
           =
       Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
                  Subject: =
Re: Sorry soulstice


                  Mobster took a scratch of damage, s=
till looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant cannon at Razorclaw=
 and fired...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
           =
         From: CYBERWOLF4 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
                Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
                   =
 Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                    Razor Claw stood confus=
ed for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped forward and hur=
led his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" he asked lookin=
g up at the bot he challenged. 
                      ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                      From: SOULSTICE 
                      To: n=
bwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 =
10:50 AM
                      Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


             =
         Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place =
now.

                      Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster,=
 I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

                      Mobster s=
witches voices.

                      Kracken: But right now, we're Mobste=
r...
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
                =
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
                       Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
         =
               Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                        Razor=
 Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like a =
challenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your alli=
ance, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped fo=
rward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach. "=
I'll go first."
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
                       From: SOULSTICE 
                          To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000=
 12:18 PM
                          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        =
                  Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn'=
t my best shot, but I didn't want to waste anything on you. In other words,=
 I am not intimidated. I have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt=
 of the attack, but i still stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, y=
ou should join the Alliance, it would do you a world of good.

            =
              Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
     =
                       ----- Original Message ----- 
                      =
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                            Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
  =
                          Subject: Sorry soulstice


                      =
      Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

        =
                    claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and =
Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the ai=
r and backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas=
 looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure and =
the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas s=
wings a huge punch at Razorclaw

                            Razor Claws he=
ad snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw=
 wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about =
ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker and cou=
ldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to ha=
ve to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
                              ----=
- Original Message ----- 
                              From: THECODE 
    =
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                         =
     Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
                             =
 Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get he=
lp.


                              OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorclaw, p=
ost damage...
                                ----- Original Message ----- =

                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                        =
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesd=
ay, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                                Subject: thr=
ee on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.


           =
                     Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the sceen of the=
 battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he mentally reporte=
d his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three until they w=
ere out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode, pulled his s=
word and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced to, your cho=
ice."

                                He aproached the three bots ready fo=
r battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
                =
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                             =
   From: dachande 
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                                Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
   =
                             Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


   =
                             ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
                =
                 
                                    They had heard the ba=
ttling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclips=
e and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exi=
ted the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.
























=

        eGroups Sponsor
